response.overview: Get ready supers, because the Incredicoaster is a go for launch! Baby Jack-Jack is on the loose, and The Incredibles need your help catching him... fast! This high-speed Point of View ride-along rockets you into the action with a loop-de- loop, laser eyes, cookie smells, and a whole lot of heroics. Dash is boosting the speed. Violet's throwing force fields. And Edna? She's not impressed, yet. From the first countdown to the final drop, this adrenaline-packed experience delivers nonstop fun straight from the world of The Incredibles. It's superpowered storytelling at its finest and a thrilling part of the DisneylandÂ® Resort 70th Celebration.
response.tagline: Speed, lasers, and baby-powered chaos! The Incredicoaster is... incredible in this Point of View film!
response.title: Incredicoaster | Disneyland Resort
